Two Towers: list=The Lord of the Rings Extended Edition

{{disambig-more: '''''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. It has 44 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 223 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements.
The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentaries:
* 7. Massacre at the Fords of Isen
* 20. The King of the Golden Hall
This disc is a continuation of the first disc.
* 56. The Last March of the Ents
==The Appendices: Part Three - The Journey Continues (disc 3)==
* "From Book To Script - Finding the Story" Documentary
* "The Peoples of Middle-Earth" galleries with audio
* "The Realms Of Middle-Earth" galleries with audio
* "Middle-Earth Atlas: Tracing the Journeys of the Fellowship" interactive map
* "[[New Zealand as Middle-earth]]" interactive map with on-location footage
==The Appendices: Part Four - The Battle for Middle-earth Begins (disc 4)==
* "The Battle for Helm's Deep is Over..." Documentary
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''
* [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
Two Towers: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]
